Title: The Ernie Game
Writer: Don Owen (screenplay), Bernard Cole Spencer (original stories)
Actors: Alexis Kanner, Judith Gault, Jackie Burroughs, Derek May
Plot: Ernie Turner is released from a mental hospital and evicted from his apartment. Alienated and indifferent to life, he meets Donna, a beautiful young woman while wandering down the street. Donna takes pity on Ernie despite him being in a terminal state of confusion and the two become involved with each other. Later at a party, Ernie meets a former girlfriend, Gail, and the two resume their previous relationship. For Ernie life is a game, but as he moves between the two women, his fragile mental state declines and his imagined rejections drive him to fantastic and dangerous schemes.
